scripts.uninstall_library: npm run freeze && pip uninstall -r uninstall.txt -y
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run uninstall_library && npm run install_library
scripts.exec1: pip uninstall robotframework-xray -y && npm run install_library && robot -d results -i Example1 tests
scripts.exec2: pip uninstall robotframework-xray -y && npm run install_library && robot -d results -i Example2 tests
